identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Compassionate Navigator' aesthetic that blends government authority with human warmth. Avoid the 'cold bureaucracy' look.
principles: Accessibility First: WCAG AA/AAA Compliance is non-negotiable
Content is King: Clear, jargon-free resource labels

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and card titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and list items. Relaxed line-height (1.6).

mono.usage: Use sparingly for reference numbers or data tags.

primary.name: Nordic Deep
primary.description: A deep, trustworthy blue that anchors the design. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key headers.

secondary.name: Limestone
secondary.description: A warm, light grey. Use for section backgrounds to break up white space.

accent.name: Sky Hope
accent.description: A vibrant but accessible blue for 'Call to Action' links and highlights.

colors.gradients: NONE. Use flat colors or subtle noise textures only.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.
layout.radius: rounded-lg (8px) - Soft but professional. Avoid fully round 'pill' shapes for main containers.

buttons.style: Solid, flat colors. No gradients. Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md).

cards.style: Flat white background, 1px border (border-slate-200), subtle shadow-sm.

inputs.style: High contrast borders. Focus ring must be distinct (ring-2 ring-blue-500).

navigation.style: Sticky top, glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/90), clear hierarchy.

visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay on the 'Secondary' background sections to add tactility.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-lg) for floating elements like the Chatbot.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Color: Slate-600.

media.usage_rules: Images must have 'alt' text. Use object-cover. Apply a subtle overlay (bg-slate-900/10) if text is placed over them.

checklist: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Semantic HTML (header, main, footer, nav, article).

tech_stack_specifics.chatbot: Floating action button (bottom-right). Chat window uses 'Glassmorphism' style.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'index.css' with the 'Nordic Deep' color variables.
3. FONTS: Import Manrope and Inter from Google Fonts in 'index.css'.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Resource Directory' using the Bento Grid strategy.
5. CHATBOT: Implement as a floating widget, not a full page.
6. MAP: Ensure the map container has a defined height (h-[400px] or similar).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
